name: Hunting - DynoWiper IOC SHA256 Hash
description: Hunt for the known DynoWiper wiper malware SHA256 hash across endpoint telemetry. DynoWiper (SHA256: 835b0d87ed2d49899ab6f9479cddb8b4e03f5aeb2365c50a51f9088dcede68d5) was used by Russian APT Sandworm in attacks against Polish energy sector companies in December 2025. This hunt queries MDE DeviceFileEvents, DeviceProcessEvents, and DeviceAlertEvents for any trace of this binary being downloaded, executed, or detected.
